casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Ellis, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Ellis (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 106.]

(No. 91-1385 Submitted October 9, 1991 Decided November 13, 1991.) Lee C. Falke, Prosecuting Attorney, and Lorine M. Reid, for appellee. Roscoe Ellis, Jr., pro se.

The motion for leave to appeal is allowed.

The judgment appealed from, 1991 WL 76768, is reversed and the cause is remanded on authority of Columbus v. Cooper (1990), 49 Ohio St.3d 42, 550 N.E.2d 937.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
